summary: Dee Bradley Baker  is an American voice actor, actor, singer, comedian former game show host and television announcer.
full_text: Dee Bradley Baker  is an American voice actor and television announcer. His major roles include animated series such as American Dad!, Codename: Kids Next Door, Gravity Falls, Phineas and Ferb, Star Wars: The Clone Wars, and The 7D, live-action series such as Legends of the Hidden Temple and Shop 'til You Drop, films such as The Boxtrolls and video games such as Halo, Gears of War, Viewtiful Joe and Spore.
title: Dee Bradley Baker
